item.title: Hack The Box: Busqueda
item.description: Overview Nmap Searchor 2.4.0 Shell as svc Detecting Root Path Exploiting some python scripts Overview Identify and exploit the vulnerable of Searchor Enumerate logs from a git repository to find user crendentials As this user, run a python script that lets us inspect enviroment variables from docker containers Obtain administrator credentials to log in gitea Analyze the script to spot a path misuse from an imported file Get root Nmap danp@local:~|â‡’ nmap -sV -sC 10.
